content: PandaDoc is a privacy-first, anonymous chat application built with Expo (React Native) for Android. The app is cleverly disguised as a document reader and lists documents available on your device
Completed an internship in app and web development, gaining hands-on experience with real-world projects. Worked on front-end and back-end tasks, enhancing both technical and teamwork skills.
Winner of the Spatial Prize in a game development contest focused on public health. Developed an engaging awareness game highlighting the dangers of super bacteria
Participated in Reimagine IGDC, a 3-day national game development hackathon. Collaborated on a creative game prototype under intense time constraints
